description: County in which the resident with the ED visit lives (not the county of the specific ED visited).
Year in which data was taken
Stratified by "Under 18," "18 and Older" and "All Ages." LGHC Indicator only uses "Under 18" population.
General demographic category under which responses have been stratified.
Specific demographic type under which responses have been stratified.
Total number of Asthma ED Visits (not the unique number of individuals). Numbers not provided if under 5.

Age-Adjusted Rate of Asthma ED Visits (per 10,000 residents): Calculated by dividing the number of asthma ED visits by the estimated population in that county and age group, age-adjusting to the 2000 U.S. Census, and multiplying by 10,000. Rates are not provided for numerators under 12.
